title: Shoot Your Chant
itunes:title: Shoot Your Chant
description:
Monday 5/1- Today on the show we did "Shoot Your Shot" and this time one of our listeners tried shooting their shot at an ex he wanted back after he got caught cheating. Also, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to former Jets player Tony Richardson because he failed leading on a chant. Moreover, Angela Rye also to helped us out with our political questions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
